main event: A civilian reported sightings of a yellow-orange colored UFO maneuvering between clouds in Auburn, New York, on February 11, 1967.
interesting points: The witness described the UFO as a saucer-like object that made a motor-like sound., The object was estimated to be about 40 feet across and was observed approximately 100 feet above ground., The sighting lasted for about 2 minutes before the object ascended and disappeared., The witness mentioned they wished they had a camera to document the sighting., There were two separate observations of the object, with a previous sighting noted on February 15, 1967.
